Question: On July 11, this person met with senior Republican leadership to assess the situation.
Hints: As of 2010[update], this person currently serves on the National Space Society Board of Governors.
This person spoke of the group and its objectives at the CPAC conference of 2008 and currently serves as its General Chairman.
On February 7, 2012, this person came in last place in the Minnesota Republican caucuses with about 10.7% of the vote.
